## CacheProvider

<GenerationInfo sourceFile="packages/cache/src/cache-provider.ts" sourceLine="19" packageName="@commandkit/cache" />

Abstract class for cache providers.
This class defines the methods that any cache provider must implement.

```ts title="Signature"
class CacheProvider {
    get(key: string) => Promise<CacheEntry<T> | undefined>;
    set(key: string, value: T, ttl?: number) => Promise<void>;
    exists(key: string) => Promise<boolean>;
    delete(key: string) => Promise<void>;
    clear() => Promise<void>;
    expire(key: string, ttl: number) => Promise<void>;
}
```

<div className="members-wrapper">

### get

<MemberInfo kind="method" type={`(key: string) => Promise&#60;<a href='/docs/next/api-reference/cache/interfaces/cache-entry#cacheentry'>CacheEntry</a>&#60;T&#62; | undefined&#62;`}   />

Retrieves a value from the cache by its key.
### set

<MemberInfo kind="method" type={`(key: string, value: T, ttl?: number) => Promise&#60;void&#62;`}   />

Sets a value in the cache with an optional time-to-live (TTL).
### exists

<MemberInfo kind="method" type={`(key: string) => Promise&#60;boolean&#62;`}   />

Checks if a cache entry exists by its key.
### delete

<MemberInfo kind="method" type={`(key: string) => Promise&#60;void&#62;`}   />

Deletes a cache entry by its key.
### clear

<MemberInfo kind="method" type={`() => Promise&#60;void&#62;`}   />

Clears all entries in the cache.
### expire

<MemberInfo kind="method" type={`(key: string, ttl: number) => Promise&#60;void&#62;`}   />

Expires a cache entry by its key after a specified time-to-live (TTL).
